```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
#Strength of legal system
cred <- read_csv("F://IntroDSproject/WDI data split/Economy.csv")
cred <- select(cred, "CountryName", "Year", "IC.LGL.CRED.XQ")
#crime[crime == 0] <- NA
cred <- cred[order(-cred$Year),]
cred <- na.omit(cred)
cred <- cred %>% distinct(CountryName, .keep_all = TRUE)
View(cred)
cred <- mutate(cred, rank.cred = -rank(IC.LGL.CRED.XQ))
cred$rank.cred <- as.numeric(as.factor(cred$rank.cred))
```
